comment.author: 26602074@N06
comment._content: A delightful view into a corner of the mind of our great bibliophile. DSM seems to have just ducked out leaving the chair still warm!

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: He certainly does! As well as our big 100 exhibition, there is a small display of Mitchell artefacts in the Mitchell Library foyer, including his armchair and revolving bookcase which appear in this photograph.
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 34383317@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Fascination Nostalgia, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 24657346@N05
comment._content: This looks like my bedroom. The piles of books covering every surface that is!!!

comment.author: 41447455@N08
comment._content: judging by his room, he must have been a great person :)
